com.vaadin.event
Interface FieldEvents.TextChangeNotifier

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTextField, PasswordField, TextArea, TextField
Enclosing interface:
FieldEvents
public static interface FieldEvents.TextChangeNotifier
extends java.io.Serializable

An interface implemented by a Field supporting FieldEvents.TextChangeEvents. An example a TextField supports FieldEvents.TextChangeListeners.
